item.title: The Hottest New Credit Deals in Europe Are Anything to Do With Defense
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- As NATO leaders huddled in The Hague in late June to iron out a plan to radically boost military spending, bankers in London were busy adding up the investor orders for a bond being offered by a little-known Czech maker of armored vehicles and ammunition. The final tally: More than $1...
